title: i want play us lol  in au ,so lag how can i do that ?
body:
my friend live in us ,he want me play with him ,but when i play lol in us servie ,  thats so lag ,  i got 200 ping ,do u guys have some good idea for me ?
ty

replies.body:
Move to US.

Honestly, You're not going to get the ping any lower.
